products.title: Splash Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Black 89mm Vertical Blind. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Opt for Splash Black to create a chic statement look in your home. Our vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1459 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
